alert.note: Alert for Clark; Kiowa; Pratt; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:43AM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Stafford, Kiowa, Pratt and Clark Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM Monday to 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are expected due to blowing and drifting snow. Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winter driving conditions will spread rapidly and abruptly eastward late Monday afternoon into Monday night. Conditions will change quickly over short times and distances, and motorists are urged to be prepared for the onset of dangerous travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
